1499980.name: Road To Adventure!
1499980.description:
Summer Vacation is here and the main problem is find a good way to spend it. So, you decide to embark on an adventure!!

  • Enjoy the different levels and their challenges Jump and Dodge to advance the levels and save the forest.
  • Master your jumping skills Master the ancient art of jumping obstacles and beat the cute enemy!
  • Enjoy a simple, engaging and fun story It's Summer Vacation! there is no time to be serious when you must save the forest, and in the process make a posible case of destruction of private property,
  • A challenging adventure awaits Have fun beating the levels, destroy every enemy that try to stop you from reaching your objectives!
